txt_en: To be yourself is all that you can do.
txt_cn: 做自己就是你所能做的一切。

txt_en: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
txt_cn: 让自己快乐的最好方式就是去让别人快乐。

txt_en: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
txt_cn: 做出伟大工作的唯一方式是热爱你所做的事。

txt_en: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
txt_cn: 快乐是最简单的感恩形式。
